--- select_singer_with_root_parent.sql
( SELECT * FROM Singers )

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  CTEs:  []ast.CommonTableExpression(nil),
  Query: &ast.SubQuery{
    Lparen: 0,
    Rparen: 24,
    Query:  &ast.Select{
      Select:   2,
      Distinct: false,
      AsStruct: false,
      Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
        &ast.Star{
          Star: 9,
        },
      },
      From: &ast.From{
        From:   11,
        Source: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 16,
            NameEnd: 23,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
          As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
          Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
      Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
      GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
      Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
      OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
      Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
    },
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
(SELECT * FROM Singers)
